1.Offline package download address: Please click on the offline package address 
2.Download the offline package to: internal storage /xinhao/online_system/

Termux can only be installed on the primary user account
Close down existing ones before creating new.
Click URL to copy or long press to open
No URL found in the terminal.
The URL is copied to the clipboard
Beautify the theme. In the sidebar, do you want to open it?
Please scroll down to see all steps if your device screen is small.
Choose the distro you want to install, and you can install multiple disto without conflict.

Distro to setup the Desktop Environment

Also please run This command inside the Linux System and not In Termux, otherwise it will not work!!
"1. I'm going to take advantage of the distro to setup OpenSSH Server"
Please scroll down to see all steps if your device screen is small.
Choose the distro you want to UNINSTALL, the distro will be removed without a trace and could not be absorbed.
Please press again to exit application

AnLinux 
is a open source project intent to "bringing the access of Linux to the Android platform. 
 
The icon of this application is seems the from https://www.iconfinder.com, which is created by the user: "Alpar - Etele Meder", you can reach the icon the author by clicking icon "author" button below. 
 
If you are & for the source code, informs in this app, Click the SOURCE CODE button.

If you are looking for scripts and rootfs used in this app, please click the CONTENT SOURCE button, They are license under gplv2.

Thanks for using this apps.


Regards, EXA Lab

"First of all, thanks for downloading AnLinux, below are some important parts, please read carefully.

1. To keep the density o small and light weight for easy install, Most distro except Arch Linux and Kali Nethunter are minimal rootfs, which means most package are not installed yet, you could install them according to your need, Distro is faked.

2. All distro are installed in this directory: / data/data/com. Termux/files/home, Please make sure that you have enough space before installing package and don't blame the app for occupying your device space because you are the one interested in it.

3. Some distro may not be Available due to your device architecture.

4. Currently, all device except MIPS based will work, if you any error such as Proot signal 6, or function not implemented, Just go to the Patches feature in app and apply SECCOMP path.


Thanks for reading, have a nice day :)"
"I'm sure you're going to choose a distro first"
"I'm sure you're going to choose a distro first"
Termux is not installed, do you want to install it now?
Step 2: Copy the command to Clipboard: %1$s \n\n This should fully remove %2$s from Termux.
Paste and enter the command to uninstall distro. Important: You will need to run this command inside Termux shell and NOT IN Linux shell.

Please scroll down to see all steps if your device screen is small.

WARNING: You should have wget installed on Linux distro before proceeding, also remember only run this command inside the Linux System and not in Termux, otherwise it will not work!! 
 
About Ashmem: System V Shared Memory emulation on Android, using Ashmem. That includes Shmget, SHmat, SHMDT and SHMCTL functions. It does not use emulation on Android, USES ashmem. And does not link to Java libraries. It USES Linux sendmsg/recvmsg API instead of transfer file handlers.

nwhat It do: If you have the error GUI designed, running the install this patch may solve the problem. 
 
How to use: env LD_PRELOAD = "/ usr/local/lib/libandroid - shmem. So" linux_command"
Step 2: Copy the command to Clipboard: %1$s \n\nThis should install %2$s on your system
Step 3: Start Termux, paste and enter the command to install Patches. Remember: You will need to run.
If you can choose to open an issue on Github, or email us and you notice it.
Thanks for purchasing Package, you can still watch video ads to support the developers, or continue to enjoy this app.

Thanks for using this app, do you want to support the developers? \n\nYou can choose to watch an AD video, which will remove advertisement for a day, or purchase a Donation Package on Play Store which remove the ads forever.
Currently no video ads are available
The ads are removed for today.

"Does not understand how it works? 

Forgot how to start or exit distro, or Excuse how to start the VNC Server(Desktop Enviroment)? 

Then this feature is for you, if you have these problem, or something you don't understand about this app, you could found some solution in the Github wiki page.

Visit Now?"
Step 2: Copy the command to Clipboard: %1$s \n\n This should setup OpenSSH on the Linux System.
Step 3: Start Termux, paste and enter the command to setup sSH.Remember: You will need to run %1$s to run the Linux System before using this command.

IMPORTANT


Please take a look at below warning noise :

1.installing Desktop Environment will take around 1 GB space, Having 1.5 GB space spared is it. 
 
2 NEVER install two Desktop Environment on a same distro, if you want to install another Desktop Environment. Distro first. To do this, use "Uninstall" feature first, then reinstall it from Dashboard.


Do you agree To proceed?
Please choose a Desktop Environment first
Please choose a Desktop Environment first
Step 2: Copy the Command to Clipboard: %1$s \n\nThis should setup %2$s and Tiger VNC on the Linux System
Step 3: Start Termux, paste and enter the command to install the Desktop environment. Remember: You will need to run %1$s to run the Linux System before using this command.
Copy the command to Clipboard: %1$s \n\nThis should install %2$s on your system, you can then run %3$s to run the command line.
Paste and enter the command to install distro. Remember: You will need to run %1$s to run the command line.

Step 2: Copy the command to Clipboard: %1$s 

This should install %2$s on your system, you can then run %3$s to run the command line.

After that, you will need to run: (C Work). Chmod 755 C. Sh &&. (First time only)

Paste and enter the command to install distro. Remember: You will need to run./ start-up -arch.sh to run the command line, after that, you will also need to run./ Additional. Sh to setup resolv.conf and pacman-key, (C work). Otherwise Network Connection and Pacman. (First time only)
Note: Please run this command inside Arch Linux shell to enable BlackArch Repository (Arch Linux need to be installed first).\n\nStep 2: Copy the command to Clipboard: %1$s

Step 3: Start Termux, enter Arch Linux shell by run. / start-up -arch.sh, then paste and enter the command to install BlackArch Repo. Remember: You will need to run./ start-up arch.sh to enter arch Linux shell first before using the command above.

Arch Linux image is bigger than other distro (Around 400 MB), And may cost a lot of device space after decompressing. Having spare space over 1.5 GB is highly it before installing. 
 
 
Note: 
 
1. Tar may produce an error while extracting the image to As: the tar: Ignoring unknown extended header keyword 'SCHILY. Fflags ', it is not harmful, simple ignore it. 
 
2 Arch Linux image is hosted on an external server, the link may broken in some special case, Please email the developers at exalabdevelopers@gmail.com if they solve this issue.

Woah, wait wait wait.

Sorry for the interrupt, here are some warning:

1.Kali Nethunter image itself is around 1GB, after decompressing, it will cost more space, It is advice to have 5GB free space before installing.

2. Decompressing the image require some time (Around 10 minutes.)

3. Desktop Environment won't work, DO NOT use Command for Kali in Nethunter.

4. Nethunter image has NOT been updated more than a year, some component is broken, if you want an up-to-date, personalized experience, Choose normal Kali Distro instead.

Please scroll down to see all steps if your device screen is small.

Please note that running wrong command in Root mode could damage the whole Android OS! 

First, this feature is for Root Users only, if you never heard of Root, Superuser, SU, SuperSU, Magisk, DISTRO WITHOUT ROOT ACCESS.

I Understand that the purpose of most user use this app is to INSTALL LINUX DISTRO.

But, If your device have ROOT ACCESS, You still want to run it without root? To be clear, having root access could have lots of benefit, especially when running high Permission software such as penetration testing tools.

For those don't know how To do it, Termux could run it root mode, Simply start Termux, and type su Command, Sh command after the su call will result in PRoot not found error.

But this word are not exist to tell you that, of course, We have a solution to RUN LINUX DISTRO WITH ROOT ACCESS, just follow the instruction below:
Press the button to copy the command: PKG install tsu-y && hash r
Start Termux, paste and enter the command above, after that, you could simply run the tsu command, then run./ Start -*. Sh like usual.

"Sorry for the quit, but this is important, so please take a look as we show this one time only.

Running Linux as Root has lots of benefit, But also contain dangerous that could wipe out whole Android OS if you don't know how to use it.

Please beware of what you are doing, 1970. The author is not responsible if you run some harmful command and brseal your device, Also please make sure you should NEVER fire up the Root terminal and run some command like RM-RF /* for experimental purpose.

By proceeding, you agree to those terms."
Please scroll down to see all steps if your device screen is small.\n\nWARNING: Only run this if you notice it error such as Proot signal 6, or function not implemented.
Copy the command to clipboard: echo "export PROOT_NO_SECCOMP=1" > >.bashrc && hash r
Paste and enter the command to install Patches. Remember: You will need this command directly inside Termux and not in the Linux distro, otherwise it will not work.

This feature is to download the rootfs(Or simply know as distro) for offline use only, if you want to install Distro you should install it from "Dashboard", Not here.

Some users would want to download rootfs for investigation or learning purpose, We created this feature so users could easily find the location to download. 
 
Clicking the Button below order to open a webpage on making the where rootfs motorcycle stored:
https://github.com/EXALAB/AnLinux-Resources/tree/master/Rootfs
without further notification.
Manage Files on the SD Card with OI File Manager.
Do you really want to delete %s?
Some of the following options may not work.
Do you really want to delete %d files?
This folder will be included in the next media scan.
This folder will be excluded during the next media scan.
Could Not Change Media Scan Settings.
Show Menu Item to exclude Folders from Media Scan.
Hide Menu Item to exclude Folders from Media Scan.
Use Dark Theme (Requires Restart of app)
Some or all items have been copied!
"Some or all items couldn't be moved!"
Nothing to paste. Copy or cut files first.
Maximal amount of RAM that may be allocated for virtual machine.\n\nOptimal values are lower than half of physical RAM available on your device.

Path to a disk image that will be used as primary hard drive. If the image file is not exist, Alpine Term will generate a snapshot of internal hard drive with pre-installed os. 

* This is a default boot device.

* This is a default boot device.

* Context on usage, the image file can grow up to several gigabytes.

Path to a disk image that will be used as secondary drive.

* Can be selected as boot device from BIOS menu.

* Context on usage, the image file Can grow up to several file size.
Path to a disk image that will be used as CD-ROm.\nCan be selected as boot device from THE BIOS menu.
A destination where QEMU will forward all queries from internal DNS server.\n\nGuest OS should be configured to use QEMU\'s internal DNS (10.0.2.3) otherwise this option will not have any effect.

A list of port forwarding rules. Each rule has the following format:

{proto}:{external port}:{internal port}

You can specify multiple rules by separating them with commas.

External ports Lower than 1024 cannot be used.
Long press on the window to move \n\n long press on the window to zoom gesture, scale the window size
Drag to the specified location \n\n pinch gesture to scale the window size
This application requires permissions to draw overrides.

Francesco Andreuzzi (Italy) 
 \ t - > Programmer 

Thanks to Luke Winward for his original idea
Refresh: Apps, Alias, Music, contacts, RSS feeds
Lock the screen on double tap
T-ui is busy, use \" CTRLC \" to stop the process
Do you like my work? A: You can offer me a coffee (CMD: $donate). B: Thank You!
You can\'t perform a manual update with the default key. You have to create a custom key on the website
The weather API is busy. Trying again at:
The index is greater than The shortcuts Count
No Bound App Found with ID:
The Reverted to the previous Theme
"Notifications Access \" Page of your System Settings" Unfortunately T-ui can\'t Redirect you to the \"Notification Access \
Notifications are supported on Android 4.3+ only. Use \' config-set show_notifications false\' To disable this message
The First time with t - the UI? \n\ttutorial -> view the tutorial on GitHub\n\ thelp-> get a list of available commands
You have to grant Storage permission
"Your Apps Preferences couldn't be loaded because Your \" t-UI \" Folder is not readable at the moment (you should try to use the command \" Restart \")"
"Your RSS Preferences couldn't be loaded because Your \" t-UI \" Folder is not readable at the moment (you should try to use the command \" Restart \")"
"Your notifications Preferences Couldn't be loaded because Your \" T-UI \" Folder is not readable at the moment (you should try to use the command \" Restart \")."
"Your XML Preferences couldn't be loaded because Your \" t-UI \" Folder is not readable at the moment (you should try to use the command \" Restart \")"
T-ui will be closed in some seconds. Click the home button to restart it
There was a problem while connecting to your device camera
The Less the arguments than expected
There was an XML problem with your file
, t-ui will use default values.\nFix or delete the file to recover your options
Spaces are not allowed Inside group names
The Internet error. The Response code:

You can scroll to see them all, change the value, or disable this message (uI. XML: show_scroll_notes_message) Your notes reached the value set in notes_max_lines. You can scroll to see them all, change the value, or disable this message.
Invalid ID: No RSS feed found
This RSS feed has \'t been checked yet
Invalid RSS: The file is empty:
There was a problem with your alias
Is equal to its value. This may lead to bad behaviors, so it has had been excluded. You should edit the name to use it

Is equal to the part of its value before the first space (i.e. aliasName=play; AliasValue = play store). This may lead to crashes and freezes, so it has had been excluded. You should edit the name to use it

Print the list of commands, or info about a command 
 
Usage: 
help [command] 
 
Example: 
 $help exit
This file is too big, consider opening it with an other Text Editor
Bluetooth is not available on this device
Command not found.\nTry to use \"$help\" or \"$tutorial\"
Write your SMS or nothing to Cancel

-add [aliasName] [alias content] -> add a new alias 
-rm [aliasName] -> remove an existing alias 
-ls-> list your aliases 
 - file - > open alias. The XML

-ls-> list your apps 
-lsh-> list your hidden apps 
-show [appName] -> re-show an hidden app 
-hide [appName] -> hide an app 
-l [appName] -> show details about an app 
-ps [appName] -> show Google Play Store page for an app 
-st [appName] -> show Settings details for an app 
-default_app [index] [appName or most_used or null] -> set the default_app at the specified index 
-frc [appName] -> fort-ui to launch an app 
 - file - > open apps. The XML 
-reset [appName] -> reset the "launched_times" value of the given app to 0 
-mkgp [groupName] -> create a new group with the given name 
-rmgp [groupName] -> delete the group with the given name 
-gpcolor [groupName] [color] -> set the color for the given group 
-addtogp [groupName] [appName] -> add the given app to the given group 
-rmfromgp [groupName] [appName] -> remove the given app from the given group 
-lsgp [OPTIONAL: group name] -> list your groups, or list the content of the given group
Set the brightness of your device \n $brightness (0-100)

Perform Basic operations (+ - * / % ^ SQRT) 
Example: 
 
 $calc 4 + 2 to 5 
1 

$calc 2 ^ (2*2) 
16 
 
 $calc sqrt25 
5
Show the Changelog of the current version

-set [option] [value] -> set the value of an option 
-append [option] [value] -> append the given string to the value of the selected option 
-file [file] -> open a config file (behavior.xml, ui.xml, theme.xml,...) 
-erase [option] -> set the value of an option to "" 
-setr [option] [value] -> same to "-set", but restarts t-ui automatically 
-get [option] -> get the value of an option 
-fontsize [value] -> change the global fontsize 
-reset [option] -> reset the value of an option 
-info [option] -> request info about the given option 
-apply [file] -> move a file to the t-ui directory 
-tutorial -> open the tutorial page
Offer a coffee to the Developer (PayPal only)

Print the Available commands, or info about a command 
 
Usage: 
 $help [command]

Extract Text from HTML Pages 
-query [filter ID] [optional: format ID] [URL] -> parse the specified XPath entry with the specified URL 
-add [type] [ID] [expression] -> add a new expression of the given type (json, xpath or format) 
-rm [ID] -> remove an existing expression 
-edit [ID] [expression] -> change an existing expression 
-ls [type] -> shows the expressions of the given type 
-tutorial -> show the tutorial on GitHub 
-file-> open the file htmlexretract. XML

-next-> play the next song 
-previor-> play the previous song 
-play-> play/pause the player 
-stop-> stop the player 
-ls-> list your tracks 
-select [song] -> play the selected song 
-info-> get info about the current song 
-seekto [seconds] -> seekto the selected part of the current song

-add [optional: lock {true/false}] [text] -> add a new note 
-rm [row] OR [text] -> remove an existing note 
-cp [row] OR [text] -> copy an existing note to clipboard List all your notes 
-ls-> 
-clear-> remove all notes (except the locked ones) 
-lock [id] OR [text] -> lock an existing note 
-unlock [id] OR [text] -> unlock an existing note 
-tutorial -> open the tutorial page on GitHub
Leave a feedback on the Play Store page
-add [ID] [regex] -> add a new regex with the given ID \n-rm [ID] -> remove the regex with the given ID \n-test [ID] [string] -> test the corresponding regex over the given string

-to [ID or packageName] [what] -> reply to the last notification from the application bound with the given ID 
-bind [appName] -> bind the application 
-unbind [appName] -> unbind the application 
-ls-> show your bound applications 
-check [ID or packageName] -> check the last notification from the application bound with the given ID 
-tutorial -> open the tutorial page on GitHub
Restart T-ui and Load Modified Values

- the gg [search this...]. - > Google Search 
 - ps [search] this... - > Google Play Store 
-u [URL] -> open the URL 
 - yt [search] this... - > YouTube 
 - dd [search] this... - > DuckDuck Go

-ls [appName] -> show the shortcuts of this app \n-use [shortcutID OR shortcut index] [optional: appName] -> use the specified shortcut \n-cp [index] [appName] -> copy to clipboard the NTH shortcut of the selected app (first: 0)
Get Info about Battery charge, wifi Status and Mobile Data

-apply [name] -> apply the selected theme (case sensitive). Require Internet connection. May take some seconds N-old-> re-apply the theme that was replaced by the current one 
-standard-> apply the standard theme 
-view-> view the available themes 
-create-> create a new theme

Print the current time with the given format 
 
Usage: 
$time [index] (index means the index of the desired time_format

Rm - > uninstall t - the UI 
-about-> show info about the developer and the current version 
 - reset - > removes the t - UI folder and resets the default Settings (restart required) 
-log [fileName] -> log the text on screen to the file 
-priority [command] [int] -> set the priority of the selected command 
-twitter-> show t-ui twitter page 
-googlep-> show the community on Google+ 
-telegram -> open the official telegram group 
-sourcecode -> open the GitHub page 
-folder -> print the path of the t-ui folder

- add [the line] [text] - > add a new note at the specified line (the note will be appended the if the line is omitted) \n-rm [line] -> remove the note at the specified line \n-clear-> remove all the notes
Open the tutorial page on GitHub

Make your device vibrate. 
 
Usage: 
 $vibrate (milliseconds) 
$vibrate [pattern: wait, wait, vibrate, wait...] 
 
Example: 300 
 $vibrate 0300500300 
 $vibrate

-set [stream] [volume: 0-100] -> set the volume for the selected stream 
-profile [mode] -> set the profile mode 
-get [stream] -> get info about the selected stream 
 
stream: 
	* voice call-> 0 
 \ t * system - > 1 
 \ t * ringer - > 2 
 \ t * media - > 3 
 \ t * alarm - > 4 
 \ t * notificaton - > 5 
 
mode: 
 \ t * silent - > 0 
 \ t * vibrate - > 1 Normal 
 \ t * - > 2

-update-> perform a manual update (this won't work unless you set a custom weather key) 
 - enable - > enable the weather 
 - disable - > disable the weather 
-tutorial -> open the weather tutorial 
-set_key [key] -> set a custom weather key

-inc [appName] -> include an application 
-exc [appName] -> exclude an application 
-color [color] [appName] -> set the color to be used for the application 
-format [ID] [appName] - apply the format with the given ID to the corresponding application 
-add_filter [ID] [filter] -> create a new filter with the given ID 
-add_format [ID] [format] -> create a new format with the given ID 
-rm_filter [ID] -> delete the filter having the given ID 
-rm_format [ID] -> delete the format having the given ID 
-access -> show the system Settings page dedicated to the Notification access 
 - file - > open the notifications. The XML 
-tutorial -> show the tutorial page

List your contacts -ls-> 
-l [contactName] -> show details about a contact 
-add-> create a new contact 
-edit [contactName] -> edit an existing contact 
-rm [contactName] -> remove a contact
Close t-UI and reset the Default Launcher

-add [ID] [update_time_in_seconds] [url] -> add a new RSS feed. T-ui will try to get new contents every [update_time_in_seconds] seconds 
-rm [ID] -> remove this RSS feed 
-ls-> list your RSS feeds 
-l [ID] -> show the whole content of the corresponding RSS feed 
-show [ID] [Boolean] -> toggle the [show] property of the given saved RSS feed 
-update_time [ID] [update_time_in_seconds] -> set the update time of the corresponding RSS feed N-format [ID] [format] -> set the format of the corresponding RSS feed ([format] can be both a string or the ID of an existing format). 
-color [ID] [color] -> set the base color of the corresponding RSS feed 
-wifi_only [ID] [Boolean] -> if [Boolean] is true, the corresponding feed will be updated only if your device is connected to a WiFi network 
-last_check [ID] -> show the last time t-ui checked this RSS feed 
-entry_tag [ID] -> set the base tag for every single entry (default: "item") 
-date_tag [ID] [tag] -> set the tag info about the publication date (default: "pubDate") 
-add_command [ID] [IDs (comma separated)] [regex] [CMD] -> create a new regex command that will be applied on the RSS feeds to IDs 
-rm_command [ID] -> rm the corresponding regex command 
-frc [ID] -> update the corresponding RSS feed 
-info [ID] -> show info about the corresponding RSS feed Settings 
-include_if_matches [ID] [regex] -> if the given regex matches on an RSS feed item, it will be shown ([regex] can be both a string or the ID of a regex saved inside regex. XML) 
-exclude_if_matches [ID] [regex] -> if the given regex matches on an RSS feed item, it won't be shown ([regex] can be both a string or the ID of a regex saved inside regex. XML) 
-add_format [ID] [format] -> create a new format that you will be able to use for more than one RSS feed 
-rm_format [ID] [format] -> remove an existing format 
-file -> open the file rss.xml
Interrupt the current shell process and create a new one

github.comwShellGithub.com 

GPL v3
 [wShell]

This program comes with ABSOLUTELY NO WARRANTY. This is free software, And you are welcome to redistribute it under certain conditions.

 2014-2018 Anton Skshidlevsky
Keep screen active while the application is running

resources.string-array:
Name
Size
Last modified
File extension The Name The Size The Last modified The File extension

Did you know? t-ui is on Twitter. Have a look (\"$ tui -twitter\")
Did you know? There\'s a Telegram group with many enthusiastic users, where you can discuss, share and chat (\"$ tui -telegram\")
Did you know? Our official Google+ community is full of tips, experimental apks and discussions (\"$ tui -googlep\")
Did you read the tutorial? (\"$ tutorial\")
Did you know that you can easily switch your theme? Have a look at the cmd \"$ theme\"
Did you know? You can create your custom theme and share it with other users. Have a look at the cmd \"$ theme -create\"
Doubts about a command? Use \"$ help cmdName\"
Did you know? You can listen to music using t-ui. Have a look at the cmd \"$ music\"
Did you know? t-ui 6.4 introduced App Groups.\nYou can get more details with the cmd \"$ apps -tutorial\"
Did you know? You can see your notifications inside t-ui. If you\'re interested, have a look at the tutorial: \"$ notifications -tutorial\"
Are you sick of clearing your screen? Have a look at the options \"clear_after_cmds\", \"clear_after_seconds\" and \"maxlines\"
Do you want to use your wallpaper as t-ui background? Use the cmd: \"$ config -set system_wallpaper true\"
Doubts about any config option? Use the cmd \"$ config -info [option]\"table
Did you know that t-ui supports aliases? For more info, use the cmd \"$ alias -tutorial\"
Did you know? You can exclude an unwanted notification by long-clicking on it
You can disable this messages with the cmd \"$ config -set show_hints false\" Did you know? T-ui is on Twitter. Have a look (\"$tui-Twitter \") Did you know? There\'s a Telegram group with many enthusiastic users, where you can talk, share and chat (\"$tui-telegram \") Did you know? Our Official Google+ Community is full of TIPS, experimental apks and Discussions (\"$tui-googlep \") Did you read the tutorial? $tutorial (\ "\") Did you know that you can easily switch your theme? Have a look at the CMD \"$theme\" Did you know? You can create your custom theme and share it with other users. Have a look at the CMD \"$theme-create \" Doubts about a command? Use \ "$help cmdName \" Did you know? Listen to music using t-ui. Have a look at the CMD \"$music\" Did you know? T-ui 6.4 AD App Groups.\nYou can get more details with the CMD \"$aps-tutorial \" Did you know? If You \'re interested, have a look at the tutorial: \"$notifications -tutorial\" Are you sick of clearing your screen? Have a look at the options \" clear_after_CMds \", \" Clear_after_seconds \" and \"maxlines\" Do you want to use your wallpaper as t-UI background? Use the CMD: \"$config-set system_wallpaper true\" Remember about any Config option? Use the CMD \"$config-info [Option]\"table Did you know that T-ui supports aliases? For more info, use the CMD \"$alia-tutorial \" Did you know? You can exclude the an unwanted notification by long - clicking on it You can disable this messages with the CMD \"$config-set show_hints false\"

Use the command \"help\" to get a list of available commands
If you want to get info about the behavior of a command, type \"help cmdName\"
Launch your apps typing their name
You can call your contacts with the cmd \"call contactName\"
t-ui is highly customizable. Check \"config -ls\" or use the cmd \"config -tutorial\" to see what you can change
You can choose within a large database of themes uploaded by t-ui users. Check the cmd \"theme -view\"
Join our community! Google+, Twitter, Telegram and GitHub. Use the cmd \"tui\" Use the command \"help\" to get a list of available commands If you want to get info about the behavior of a command, type \"help cmdName\" Launch your apps typing their name You can call your contacts with the CMD \" Call contactName\" T-ui is Highly customizable. Check \" config-ls \" or use the CMD \" config-tutorial \" to see what you can change You can choose within a large database of themes at the end of the day. Check the CMD \" theme-view \" Join our community! Google+, Twitter, Telegram and GitHub. Use the CMD \" Tui \"

" Please keep this page at the front end and do nothing else!

"This software is produced by Termux, which is just a simple integrated version. It does not need root permission to achieve backup and restore operation, so I won't have to change a phone to reinstall the system, right? This is a really good option for people who don't have root, and if you do have root, I think you can use titanium backup, too."

"How do I use the boot command [not available for long-running operations such as: PKG Update]? 
 commands are separated by &&, if you must use time-consuming operation: command & end 
 for example, If I boot up and want to execute LS CD.. SSH mysqld(to start mysql) 
 command is: ls && CD.. The correct example: ls && CD && SSH & mysqld &
 The wrong example: ls & CD && SSH && mysqld &
 When there is only one command: just write the command on that line instead of writing &&
 boot command If you type the wrong boot command, the system will ignore all boot commands"
